item.title: A haphazard journey to a generative art twitter bot with matplotlib
item.description:
Description

Talk: A haphazard journey to a generative art twitter bot with matplotlib - Gautam Sisodia

This talk was presented at PyCon India 2021 Online.

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/2021/proposals/a-haphazard-journey-to-a-generative-art-twitter-bot-with-matplotlib~eER80/

Click here to subscribe to the PyCon India channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/inpycon?sub_confirmation=1 Follow PyCon India on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconindia Follow PyCon India on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PyConIndia/
item.dc:creator: Gautam Sisodia
